AUTH_PAGE.passwordResetPrompt: Do you want to reset the password for '{{ address }}'?
AUTH_PAGE.credentialsFailed: Username and password do not match.
AUTH_PAGE.signupSuccessText: We just sent you an email with an account confirmation link.
AUTH_PAGE.noEmailAddressText: Please enter a valid email address.
AUTH_PAGE.resetLinkSentText: We just sent you an email with a password reset link.
AUTH_PAGE.beeAwareDescription: Bee aware can help you keep track of your activities with your bee colonies all year round. It's a quick and easy way to remember how much you harvested, how much food you gave to which colony ... and also how many Varroa mites you counted, when you made treatments etc. It's free to use, and you will never be asked to enter any personal data whatsoever apart from a valid email address.

COLONIES_PAGE.noColonies: No buzz yet - time to add your first colony.
COLONIES_PAGE.emptyGroupHint:
Drag colonies here by their bee icon
Delete group by swiping

FORMER_COLONIES_PAGE.noColonies: No colonies deceased or sold yet.
